title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
Lissom Technologies Pvt Ltd is looking for Android Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Conceptualizing and formulating apps that are suitable for use on all types of Android devices.
  2. Implementing measures to safeguard users' data.
  3. Ensuring that the construction and presentation of your apps are congruent with the company's standards.
  4. Proofreading your code and correcting mistakes before each app is released.
  5. Collaborating with UI and UX Designers, as well as Software Testers, to ensure that each app is presentable and in perfect working order.
  6. Liaising with the marketing department to ensure consistency in our company's 'voice' across the board.
  7. Monitoring app reviews to detect areas for improvement.
  8. Creating app updates, including bug fixes and additional features, for release.

title: Sales/Business Development Executive
tagsAndSkills: Sales,Business Development Executive,Sales Executive,Development,Business development,Sales executive activities
jobDescription:
• A Sales/Business Development Executive is a results-driven professional responsible for identifying and acquiring new business opportunities, nurturing client relationships, and driving revenue growth
  • This role involves strategically prospecting potential clients, understanding their needs, and effectively presenting and selling the organization's products or services
  • Key Responsibilities:Lead Generation: Identify and research potential clients, industries, and markets to generate new sales leads and opportunities
  • Client Acquisition: Develop and execute sales strategies to acquire new clients and customers, including cold calling, networking, attending industry events, and leveraging digital channels
  • Client Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure satisfaction, retention, and upselling opportunities
  • Sales Presentations: Create compelling sales presentations and proposals that effectively communicate the organization's products or services, highlighting their value and addressing client needs
  • Negotiation: Negotiate contract terms, pricing agreements, and service-level agreements with clients, striving for mutually beneficial partnerships
  • Sales Targets: Set and achieve sales targets and revenue goals, consistently meeting or exceeding quotas
  • Market Analysis: Stay informed about market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies
  • Product/Service Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of the organization's products or services and effectively convey their value pros to clients
  • Sales Reporting: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, track progress, and regularly report on sales performance and forecasts
  • Feedback Loop: Gather and relay client feedback, market insights, and competitor intelligence to the organization for product/service improvement and innovation
  • Customer Service: Address and resolve client inquiries, concerns, or issues promptly and professionally, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction
  • Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and customer support, to achieve sales objectives and align strategies

title: Senior Software Engineer - iOS Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for an iOS developer having of 4 to 7 years of experience. The primary focus will be to design, develop and ship the Ads SDK for monetising iOS applications. The SDKs are designed to be the conduit for app developers to integrate with our highly scaled backend systems and control all aspects of the app s requests and responses to the backend. In addition, the SDK is responsible for the rendering and measurement integration for the various ad formats that are presented in the app.
 
Responsibilities:
  • Implement commercial-grade software, using the company standards for coding style and unit testing coverage as the backdrop for your work product.
  • Design and build new features for PubMatic s Ads SDK & demonstrative applications for the iOS platform & ensure the performance, quality of each feature
  • Provide helpful and productive code reviews for peers of the team. Productive code reviews are ones where the recipient is helped by your feedback and can act upon your feedback, not just picking out errors or design flaws.
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization as standards
  • Participate in the customer support process by analyzing the bug reported on the SDK and providing the best possible and stable solution for the same. And ensure the fix should not cause any reverse impact on SDK features.
Requirements:
  • Minimum 4 to 7 years of experience in iOS app development with s trong computer science fundamentals like data structures, and algorithms.
  • Proficient with Objective-C and Swift, and Cocoa Touch. Knowledge of Cocoapods, static/dynamic frameworks
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Webkit, Core Animation, Core audio.
  • Experience with memory management, multithreading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS clients to backend services
  • Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git and f amiliarity with continuous integration like Jenkins, Static code analyzers
Benefits : Our benefits package includes the best of what leading organizations provide, such as stock options, paternity/maternity leave, healthcare insurance, broadband reimbursement. As we'll, when we're back in the office, we all benefit from a kitchen loaded with healthy snacks and drinks and catered lunches and much more

title: Senior Service Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Team leading,Interpersonal skills,SAP,Renewable energy,Mechanical,Back office,MS Office tools,Information management
jobDescription:
• Perform technical advisory for repair activities executed on customers responsibility.
  • Interact with customers during the work execution.
  • Commissioning of service products.
  • Interacting with FS back office and TS during work execution.
  • Perform internal and external progress status reports of the assigned work.
  • Create the Service Work Reports.
  • Ensure that the work is executed according to Wartsila quality, health and environmental guidelines and customer site procedures.
  • Comply with the management system accordingly to what has been implemented locally for her/his position.
  • Proactively consult, advise and promote available Wartsila solutions and products to customer.
  • Perform all activities needed to reach the objectives of the position and comply with the orders, instructions, values and company policies applicable as employee and to the position.
  • Knowledge sharing ability and availability to training colleagues.
  • Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of Wartsila products
  • Check and adjust relevant systems (ie auxiliary equipment)
Other Skills:
  • Information management skills, including MS Office Tools.
  • Knowledge in 4-stroke marine engines as well as related systems and components
  • Relevant hands-on experience in mechanical and electrical disciplines
  • Strong knowledge of auxiliary equipment.
  • Electrical troubleshooting skills are considered an advantage.
  • Good command of English both written and verbal.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Desire to work in a multicultural environment.
  • Ability to perform under pressure.
  • Motivation to learn and grow professionally.
  • Willingness to travel at least 7-8 months per year.
  • Experience of writing the technical reports.
Education :
  • Diploma or Bachelor degree in Mechanical/Marine/Electrical with minimum 6 years of experience
  • Job Location: Navi Mumbai
Experience :
  • Mechanical technical experience on Wartsila products mainly DF Engines
  • Mechanical officer on Ships with Wartsila engines or similar application -Strong knowledge of auxiliaries equipment
  • On-site team leading and managing of the assigned team and related activities during the work execution (when applicable).
  • Leadership and Team player skills
